text: Tillie's Punctured Romance is a 1914 American silent comedy movie directed by Mack Sennett and was based on the play Tillie's Nightmare by A. Baldwin Sloane and Edgar Smith. It stars Marie Dressler, Charlie Chaplin, Mack Swain, Charles Bennett and was distributed by Alco Film Corporation. ==Other websites== * * Category:1914 comedy movies Category:1910s romance movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Mack Sennett
title: Tillie's Punctured Romance (1914 movie)
